title: ‘Today I Could Actually Have Been in the Front Group’: Tom Pidcock Encouraged after Big Climbing Performance
content:
British GC hope satisfied in Tirreno-Adriatico after ‘one of the best climbing performances’ of his career

Read the full article at ‘Today I Could Actually Have Been in the Front Group’: Tom Pidcock Encouraged after Big Climbing Performance on Velo.
author: sstokes
